TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl
Public MustInherit Class WebZone Inherits CompositeControl

summary.span: 作为 Web 部件应用程序中充当服务器控件的容器的所有控件（包括 Web 部件 控件、服务器控件和用户控件）的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all controls that act as containers for server controls (including Web Parts controls, server controls, and user controls) in Web Parts applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件区域是包含服务器控件在网页上，并提供一致的用户界面 (UI)、 布局和呈现为包含的控件的定义的区域。A Web Parts zone is a defined region that contains server controls on a Web page, and provides a consistent user interface (UI), layout, and rendering for the contained controls. 区域在浏览器中呈现为 HTML 表。Zones are rendered in a browser as HTML tables. 类是所有 Web 部件区域的基类。The class is the base class for all Web Parts zones. 对区域控件是设计为包含其他控件，因此一个复合控件类继承自类。A zone control is a composite control designed to contain other controls, hence the class inherits from the class. 连同控件和控件 （或可以放置在区域中其他用户或服务器控件），区域控件派生自基类构成 Web 部件应用程序的基本构建基块。Together with the control and controls (or other user or server controls that can be placed in zones), zone controls derived from the base class form the essential building blocks of a Web Parts application. Web 部件区域的一个重要作用是启用它们所包含的控件的完整 Web 部件功能。A critical role of Web Parts zones is to enable full Web Parts functionality for the controls they contain. 每个 Web 部件页包含至少一个区域，区域可以包含零个或多个部件控件。Every Web Parts page contains at least one zone, and a zone can contain zero or more part controls. 区域所需的 Web 部件的功能。Zones are required for Web Parts functionality. 如果没有区域，甚至是派生的控件类可以具有很少 Web 部件的功能。Without zones, even controls that derive from the class can have very little Web Parts functionality. 相反，由于 Web 部件控件集的设计，你可以将放置普通的 ASP.NET 控件、 服务器控件或用户控件添加到区域 (派生自)，并通过在该区域，这些普通服务器控件是启用。 若要充当控件在运行时。Conversely, because of the design of the Web Parts control set, you can place ordinary ASP.NET controls, server controls, or user controls into a zone (which derives from ), and by virtue of being in the zone, these ordinary server controls are enable to act as controls at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档类。For details, see the documentation for the class. > [!NOTE] > 可以添加或的网页区域之外，但在这种情况下，它们只需函数为普通服务器控件的控件。It is possible to add or controls to a page outside of a zone, but in that case they simply function as ordinary server controls. 有两大类中 Web 部件的区域的控件的集，所有这些继承自基类。There are two broad categories of zones in the Web Parts control set, all of which inherit from the base class. - 区域。 zones. 这些文件组包含（和其他服务器和用户） 控件和窗体用户与大多数情况下进行交互的主用户界面的 Web 部件页。These contain (and other server and user) controls, and form the primary UI of Web Parts pages that users interact with most of the time. - 区域。 zones. 这些区域提供的 Web 部件页的特殊视图，使用户能够修改 （个性化） 内容、 布局、 外观、 行为和控件中包含的属性Web 部件页上的区域。These zones provide special views of a Web Parts page that enable users to modify (personalize) the content, layout, appearance, behavior, and properties of controls contained in zones on a Web Parts page. 例如，区域是提供页上，使用户能够添加和删除服务器控件的目录视图。For example, a zone is a that provides a catalog view of a page, enabling users to add and remove server controls. 区域是另一种，提供了一个页面，使用户能够修改并编辑页，以及属性、 外观和行为的控件的布局的编辑视图。An zone is another type of that provides an editing view of a page, enabling users to modify and edit the layout of the page, along with the properties, appearance, and behavior of the controls. 每个区域中 Web 部件控件集用来包含控件的相应的类型派生自类，作为区域的主要内容区域和主要用户界面部件控件。Each zone in the Web Parts control set is designed to contain a corresponding type of control derived from the class, with the part controls serving as the main content and primary UI of the zone. 下表中显示 Web 部件控件集，以及它们包含的部件控件的相应类型中的区域类型。Zone types in the Web Parts control set, along with the corresponding types of part controls they contain, are shown in the following table. |部件控件类型Part control type|区域类型Zone type| |-----------------------|---------------| | (和服务器和用户控件，与包装在运行时) (and server and user controls, which are wrapped with a at run time)| (基类是) (the base class is )| | (多个派生的控件提供自定义的 Web 部件控件集，与可以开发控件) (several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom controls can be developed)| (基类是) (the base class is )| | (多个派生的控件提供自定义的 Web 部件控件集，与可以开发控件) (several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom controls can be developed)| (基类是) (the base class is )| | （连接控件是唯一的它们不是从基类继承的部件控件） (connection controls are unique in that they are not part controls that inherit from the base class)| (直接继承自) (inherits directly from )| 中的 Web 部件控件的所有区域都具有基本的常见用户界面元素，它们从基类继承类。All zones in the Web Parts control have basic, common user interface elements that they inherit from the base class. 并非所有这些元素上每个区域，并且可见，但每个区域类型都有这些常见的、 与区域相关的 UI 元素下, 表中所述。Not all these elements are visible on every zone, but each zone type is capable of having these common, zone-related UI elements, as described in the following table. |区域部分Zone section|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |HeaderHeader|区域的上半部分。The top section of a zone. 它包括标头的文本，这可能包括的标题区域;区分开来标头; 的样式属性 （如的边框颜色或背景色）区域级别的谓词 （由按钮、 超链接或图像） 和用户可以单击以执行可应用到整个区域，例如，关闭区域的 UI 操作。It includes header text, which can include a title for the zone; style attributes (such as a border or background color) that distinguish the header; and zone-level verbs (represented by buttons, hyperlinks, or images) that users can click to perform UI actions that apply to the entire zone, such as closing a zone. 多个属性，如， ，和，与区域的标题区域相关。Several properties, such as , , and , relate to the header area of a zone. 如果在区域中的区域级别的谓词和属性适用于它们。If there are zone-level verbs in the zone, the and properties apply to them. 请注意，这些两个谓词属性应用到区域级别的谓词，不到该区域中包含每个部件控件中的谓词。Note that these two verb properties apply to zone-level verbs only, not to verbs in the individual part controls contained in the zone. 标头未包含在每种类型的区域;它们通常出现在区域没有需要使用文本和动词，如关闭谓词的常见标头区域。Headers are not present in every type of zone; typically they appear in zones where there is a need to have a common header area with text and a verb, such as a close verb.| |正文Body|主要内容区域的部分。The main contents section of a zone. 派生自每个区域有一个正文部分。Every zone that derives from has a body section. 用于所有类型的区域中 Web 部件控件集，该区域的正文包含指定的类型的控件 （或其他服务器控件） 的区域类型对应上, 表中所示。For all types of zones in the Web Parts control set, the body of the zone contains the designated type of controls (or other server controls) that correspond to a zone type, as indicated in the previous table. 各个成员类会影响内容正文部分中，如， ， ，和属性。Various members of the class affect the contents of the body section, such as the , , , and properties. 如果正文部分为空，可以在某些情况下显示消息。If the body section is empty, the message can be displayed in certain situations.| |镶边Chrome|呈现区域中每个部件控件的常见 UI 元素。The common UI elements rendered for each part control in a zone. 这是截然不同的讨论的样式属性应用于该区域然后重试。chrome 特别适用于所包含的部件控件。This is distinct from a discussion of style attributes that apply to the zone itself; chrome applies specifically to the contained part controls. Chrome 包括谓词、 边框和背景色或区域的部件控件的标题文本的字体样式等其他样式特性。Chrome includes verbs, borders, and other style attributes such as background color, or font style of the title text, for a zone's part controls. 区域使用适合于类型的部件控件，它包含一个单一的 chrome 对象来确定 chrome 详细信息 (例如，对象，其中包含控件)。A zone determines the chrome details by using a single chrome object appropriate to the type of part controls it contains (for example, a object for a that contains controls). 此单一 chrome 对象处理 chrome 详细信息以及该区域中的所有部件控件的呈现。This single chrome object handles the chrome details and the rendering for all the part controls in the zone. 这使开发人员能够创建可以在其中指定一致的、 常见的外观和感觉的所有部件控件的区域。This enables developers to create zones in which they can specify a consistent, common look and feel for all the part controls. 某些属性区域的部件控件包括与 chrome ， ， ，和属性。Some properties that relate to the chrome for a zone's part controls include the , , , and properties. 请注意，在基类中不实现最 chrome 相关的属性，包括特定的属性来引用特定类型的区域，chrome 对象类。Note that most chrome-related properties, including a specific property to reference the chrome object for a particular type of zone, are not implemented in the base class. 相反，大多数特定于 chrome 的功能的区域是根据其部件控件的独特需求的特定区域类型上实现。Instead, most chrome-specific features of zones are implemented on specific zone types as appropriate to the unique needs of their part controls. 请参阅本主题的上一个表中列出每个区域类型的主题。See the topics for each zone type listed in the previous table of this topic.| |部件控件Part Controls|驻留在一个区域的正文部分中的控件。The controls that reside in the body section of a zone. 每个区域都继承自类包含一个或多个部件控件的相应类型，其正文部分中，如本主题中的上一个表中所示。Every zone that inherits from the class contains in its body section one or more part controls of a corresponding type, as shown in the previous table in this topic. 这些部件控件形成主 UI 的 Web 部件应用程序。These part controls form the main UI of Web Parts applications. 大多数区域类型都派生自有一个集合属性，使他们能够引用其所包含的部件控件，如上的属性类，和属性上的类。Most zone types that derive from have a collection property that enables them to reference all their contained part controls, such as the property on the class, and the property on the class.| |页脚Footer|区域的下半部分。The bottom section of a zone. 如标头部分中，它的区域，每种类型中不存在但在中，通常会出现区域。Like the header section, it is not present in every type of zone, but usually occurs in zones. 典型的脚注部分的内容是确定的谓词或应用谓词，如在页脚中显示的谓词区域。Typical contents of a footer section are verbs such as an ok verb or an apply verb, which appear in the footer of zones. 与的脚注部分相关的一些属性包括， ， ，和属性。Some properties that relate to the footer section include the , , , and properties.| 大多数的前面介绍的区域的公共用户界面元素的表中讨论了类的属性。Most of the class's properties are discussed in the preceding table that describes the common UI elements of zones. 类还具有呈现内容与其角色相关的几种方法。The class also has several methods relating to its role of rendering content. ， ， ，和方法所有可以写以提供以编程方式控制区域的每个特定部分的呈现。The , , , and methods can all be overridden to provide programmatic control over the rendering of each specific section of a zone. 例如，如果你想要自定义的目录中的区域应用程序的所有脚注部分呈现，您无法从继承类中重写方法继承自，并将更改的呈现页脚部分。For example, if you want to customize the rendering of all the footer sections of catalog zones in your application, you could inherit from the class, override the method inherited from , and change the rendering of the footer section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 代码示例的第一部分演示两个自定义控件派生自类。The first part of the code example shows two custom controls that derive from the class. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_Zone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/CS/zonewebparts.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_Zone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/VB/zonewebparts.vb#2)] 代码示例的第二部分演示一个网页承载控件。The second part of the code example shows a Web page that hosts the controls. 请注意，在声明性标记包含两个控件，控件和一个控件。Notice that the declarative markup contains two controls, a control and an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/CS/zoneoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/VB/zoneoverviewvb.aspx#1)] 可以加载的页面在浏览器，并在查看不同区域的行为方式的各种页显示模式之间进行切换。You can load the page in a browser and switch among the various page display modes to see how the different zones behave. 显示模式，并使用户能够在它们之间进行切换的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

para.span: 很少需要直接继承类来开发自定义 Web 部件区域。

span.span: You rarely need to inherit directly from the class to develop custom Web Parts zones.

para.span: Web 部件控件集包含在备注部分中，上面列出的专用的区域，通常可以派生自其中一个将自定义行为添加到区域。

span.span: The Web Parts control set contains the specialized zones listed above in the Remarks section, and usually you can derive from one of them to add custom behavior to a zone.

para.span: 如果您决定要直接从中继承类，必须重写属性和方法的数量 (请参阅的文档的成员类)。

span.span: If you do decide to inherit directly from the class, you must override a number of properties and methods (see the documentation for the members of the class).

para.span: 你还必须创建一个自定义控制，根据需要自定义控件来创建唯一的显示模式，在其中查看您的区域和其他自定义以让您在 Web 部件控件集内工作的区域。

span.span: You must also create a custom control, optionally a custom control to create a unique display mode in which to view your zone, and other customizations to make your zone work within the Web Parts control set.
Introduction to Web Parts

related.span: 概述： Web 部件控件集

span.span: Overview: The Web Parts Control Set

related.span: 演练： 更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string BackImageUrl { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property BackImageUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ BackImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BackImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指向区域的背景图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to a background image for a zone.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示指向用作区域的背景图像的图像的 URL。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image used as a background image for the zone.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 区域的背景图像将显示在所有区域的内容会在其中可见的显示模式。The background image for a zone is visible in all display modes in which a zone's contents are visible. 如果区域不包含部件控件，图像将显示在控件的后面。If a zone contains part controls, the image appears behind the controls. 如果一个区域不包含任何控件，其内容不会呈现在浏览模式下，因此不会显示该图像。If a zone contains no controls, its contents are not rendered in browse mode, so the image is not displayed. 如果提供的图像小于区域的正文，它将平铺以涵盖完整正文区。If the supplied image is smaller than the body of a zone, it is tiled to cover the full body area. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，有两个区域中的声明性标记中，第二个``元素为空。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl/CS/zonebackimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl/VB/zonebackimageurlvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中，您可以切换到设计模式可查看空区域中的图像。In a browser, you can switch to design mode to see the image in the empty zone. 请注意，实际 URL未在此示例中提供的属性。Note that an actual URL for the property is not provided in this example. 有关如何更改页面的详细信息显示模式，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string EmptyZoneText { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property EmptyZoneText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ EmptyZoneText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.EmptyZoneText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当区域不包含任何控件时显示的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a message that appears when a zone contains no controls.

value.span: 一个字符串，其中包含在空区域中显示的消息。

span.span: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.

value.span: 默认的特定于区域性的字符串由 .NET Framework 提供。

span.span: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的文本属性区域中没有任何控制并且该区域是一个个性化设置模式，例如编辑、 设计或目录模式中时显示。The text in the property appears when there are no controls in a zone, and the zone is in one of the personalization modes, such as edit, design, or catalog mode. > [!NOTE] > 当区域进入一种允许对该区域的内容进行个性化设置更改个性化设置模式控件将设置属性值设置为`true`中其所引用的显示模式对象属性。When a zone enters one of the personalization modes that would allow personalization changes to be made to the zone's contents, the control sets the property value to `true` on the display mode object referenced in its property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，有两个区域中的声明性标记中，第二个``元素为空。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText/CS/zoneemptyzonetextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText/VB/zoneemptyzonetextvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中，您可以切换到设计模式，才能查看为提供的文本空区域中显示的属性。In a browser, you can switch to design mode to see the text supplied for the property displayed in the empty zone. 有关如何更改页面的详细信息显示模式，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EmptyZoneTextStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ EmptyZoneTextStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取空区域中的占位符文本的样式特性。

span.span: Gets the style attributes for the placeholder text in an empty zone.

value.span: ，其中包含分配给区域的 属性的文本的样式特性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the text assigned to a zone's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ErrorStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ ErrorStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于呈现在无法加载或创建 控件时显示的错误消息的样式特性。

span.span: Gets the style attributes for rendering the error message that is displayed if a control cannot be loaded or created.

value.span: 包含该错误消息的样式特性的 。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，如果.NET Framework 无法加载或创建的实例控制的一个实例类已创建并显示在其原位置。At run time, if the .NET Framework is unable to load or create an instance of a control, an instance of the class is created and displayed in its place. 此对象包含错误消息，并从的样式特性属性应用到的错误消息。This object contains an error message, and the style attributes from the property are applied to the error message.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property HasFooter As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool HasFooter { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示区域中是否具有页脚区域。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a footer area.

value.span: 如果区域具有页脚区域，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the zone has a footer area; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性主要由控件开发人员创建自定义区域。The property is primarily used by control developers who are creating custom zones. 它作为一个标志，以便 Web 部件控件集呈现的页脚区域恰当时才存在。It exists as a flag so that the Web Parts control set renders a footer only when appropriate for a zone. 例如，属性重写此属性，并返回`false`，以便不呈现页脚控件。For example, the property overrides this property and returns `false`, so that a footer is not rendered for a control. 工具区域 (区域间接派生通过类类，如和) 必须具有表尾，以便例如，它们可以如呈现常见用户界面 (UI) 谓词和按钮**确定**，**应用**，并**取消**区域的底部。Tool zones (zones that derive indirectly from the class by means of the class, such as and ) must have footers so that, for example, they can render common user interface (UI) verbs with buttons such as **OK**, **Apply**, and **Cancel** at the bottom of the zone. 因为属性是`true`工具区域不在默认情况下，需要重写属性。Because the property is `true` by default, tool zones do not need to override the property.

para.span: 如果你要创建的自定义工具区域的派生，可以重写方法并提供区域的页脚的呈现。

span.span: If you are creating a custom tool zone that derives from , you can override the method and provide rendering for your zone's footer.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property HasHeader As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool HasHeader { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示区域是否具有页眉区域。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a header area.

value.span: 如果该区域具有页眉区域，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the zone has a header area; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性主要由控件开发人员创建自定义区域。The property is primarily used by control developers who are creating custom zones. 它作为一个标志，以便 Web 部件控件集呈现的标头区域恰当时才存在。It exists as a flag so that the Web Parts control set renders a header only when appropriate for a zone. 例如，属性重写此属性，并返回`false`除非页处于一种模式允许个性化设置。For example, the property overrides this property and returns `false` unless the page is in one of the modes that allow personalization. 在这种情况下，为不呈现标头浏览模式，而在大多数其他模式下呈现一个标头中的控件。In this case, a header is not rendered for a control in browse mode, while in most other modes a header is rendered. 显示模式，并使用户能够在它们之间进行切换的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 工具区域 (区域间接派生通过类类，如和) 必须具有显示页面时才在适当的显示模式下的标头。Tool zones (zones that derive indirectly from the class by means of the class, such as and ) must have headers that appear only when the page is in the appropriate display mode. 因为属性是`true`默认情况下，它们不需要重写属性。Because the property is `true` by default, they do not need to override the property.

para.span: 如果你要创建的自定义工具区域的派生，可以重写方法并提供呈现区域的标头。

span.span: If you are creating a custom tool zone that derives from , you can override the method and provide rendering for your zone's header.

related.span: 演练： 更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 获取或设置区域的页眉区的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text for the header area of a zone.

value.span: 一个字符串，包含区域的页眉文本。

span.span: A string that contains the header text for the zone.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容区域的Web 页面上输入特定显示模式时，将显示属性。The contents of a zone's property are displayed when a Web page enters certain display modes. 例如上一个页，具有,控制分配给的文本时页面上输入编辑、 目录或设计模式下，属性变为可见。For example, on a page that has a control, the text assigned to the property becomes visible when the page enters edit, catalog, or design mode. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，有两个区域中的声明性标记中，第二个``元素为空。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_HeaderText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_HeaderText/CS/zoneheadertextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_HeaderText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_HeaderText/VB/zoneheadertextvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中，可以将页切换到设计模式以查看为提供的文本标头区域的区域中显示的属性。In a browser, you can switch the page to design mode to see the text supplied for the property displayed in the header area of the zone. 有关如何更改页面的详细信息显示模式，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub LoadViewState (savedState As Object)

span.span: The previously saved state.

summary.span: 为某个区域加载以前保存的状态信息。

span.span: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法加载以前保存的区域的状态信息。The method loads previously saved state information for a zone. 它将替代基方法以便如加载某个区域的各种样式属性的状态信息， ，和。It overrides the base method to also load state information for the various style properties of a zone, such as , , and .

exception.span: 对象的大小与当前视图状态对象的大小不相等。

span.span: The size of the object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的内容和此控件的边框之间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between the contents of a control and the border of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于定义每个控件的内容区域中包含的所有控件与其边框之间的标准边距。Use this property to define a standard padding amount between the content of each control and its border for all controls contained in a zone.

exception.span: 赋给该属性的值为负数。

span.span: The value assigned to the property is a negative number.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PartChromeStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ PartChromeStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取适用于区域所包含的 Web 部件控件的边框的样式属性。

span.span: Gets style characteristics that apply to the borders of Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

value.span: ，其中包含区域所包含的 Web 部件控件的边框样式特性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the borders that surround Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件可以具有其自身中定义的边框属性。A Web Parts control can have its own border, defined in the property. 包含控件的区域可以添加其他控件周围以及外部边框。The zone that contains the control can add an additional outer border around the control. 区域可以放置在每个 Web 部件控件外边框由属性。The outer border that a zone can place around each of its Web Parts controls is determined by the property. 此属性不会取消扩展中包含的属性特性对象; 它是与合并或添加到它们。This property does not cancel out the property attributes contained in the object; it is merged with or added to them. 此属性使其包含的 Web 部件控件的每个提供常见且一致的边框区域。It enables a zone to provide a common and consistent border for each of the Web Parts controls it contains. > [!IMPORTANT] > 尽管样式设置不适用于主要区域可以围绕它所包含的控件设置，如果在设置其他属性的外边框属性引用的对象，如，浏览器将解释这些也适用于用来呈现该区域的表的所有子元素的样式特性。Although the style settings apply primarily to the outer border that a zone can set around the controls it contains, if you set additional properties on the object referenced by the property, such as , the browser interprets those style attributes as applying to all the sub-elements of the table used to render a zone. 因此，设置所引用的样式对象的属性属性具有相同的效果设置为控件所引用对象的属性属性。Hence, setting the property for the style object referenced by the property has the same effect on a control as setting the property on the object referenced by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性设置的区域中包含的 Web 部件控件外部边框的样式特性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to set style attributes for the outer borders of Web Parts controls contained in a zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle/CS/zonepartchromestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle/VB/zonepartchromestylevb.aspx#1)] 请注意，当首次加载页面的浏览器中，上部的控件具有其自己绿色边框宽度为 2 个像素，按照中的页的声明性标记。Note that when you first load the page in a browser, the upper control has its own green border with a width of 2 pixels, as set in the declarative markup for the page. 用户单击日历之后，页面以编程方式更改这两个区域中控件的边框为红色，并将其边框宽度设置为 4 个像素，但上面的控件将保留其原始的绿色内部边框。After a user clicks the calendar, the page programmatically changes the borders of both controls in the zone to red, and sets their border width to 4 pixels, yet the upper control retains its original green inner border.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Property PartChromeType As PartChromeType

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType PartChromeType { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置构成区域所包含的 Web 部件控件的框架的边框类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of border that frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

value.span: ，确定构成区域所包含的 Web 部件控件的框架的边框类型。

span.span: A that determines the type of border that frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的行为类似于一个区域中的 Web 部件控件的默认属性。The property acts like a default property for the Web Parts controls in a zone. 如果在 Web 部件控件及其设置属性，属性重写的效果属性在运行时。If a Web Parts control has its property set, that property overrides the effect of the property at run time. 如果控件的属性未设置，或设置为，则属性确定哪种边框的控件具有。If the control's property is not set, or is set to , the value of the property determines what kind of border the control has.

span.span: The value is not one of the values.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PartStyle As TableStyle
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle ^ PartStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取适用于区域所包含的每个 Web 部件控件的边框和内容的样式属性。

span.span: Gets style characteristics that apply to the border and contents of each Web Parts control contained by a zone.

value.span: ，其中包含区域中 Web 部件控件的样式特性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the Web Parts controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 样式属性应用于的边框和区域中每个 Web 部件控件的内容。The style attributes apply to the border and contents of every Web Parts control in a zone. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 此属性，可提供一致的样式的区域不包含的所有控件的内容。This property enables you to provide a consistent style for the contents of all the controls a zone contains. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，引用声明性标记中的区域，没有``元素和一个``元素中的，并且这两个控件在运行时操作作为 Web 部件控件，因为它们是在某个区域中。Note that in the zone referenced in the declarative markup, there is an `` element and an `` element, with both controls acting as Web Parts controls at run time because they are in a zone. 用户单击日历控件上的日期后，页面以编程方式使用属性来更改该区域中的所有部件控件的背景色为红色。After the user clicks a date on the calendar control, the page programmatically uses the property to change the background color of all part controls in the zone to red. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_PartStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartStyle/CS/zonepartstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_PartStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartStyle/VB/zonepartstylevb.aspx#1)]
